009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting;
010
011import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.LinearMapping2D;
015
016/**
017 * Describes a fitter based on a linear transformation model.
018 * @author WB
019 */
020public interface LinearFit2D {
021        
022        /**
023         * Returns the (3,3) or (2,3) transformation matrix A for this fit, such that
024         * {@code y_i ~ A * x_i} (with {@code x_i} in homogeneous coordinates).
025         * 
026         * @return the transformation matrix for this fit
027         */
028        double[][] getTransformationMatrix();
029        
030        /**
031         * Retrieves the total (squared) error for the estimated fit.
032         * @return the fitting error
033         */
034        double getError();
035        
036        
037        default public double calculateError(Pnt2d[] P, Pnt2d[] Q, RealMatrix A) {
038                final int m = Math.min(P.length,  Q.length);
039                LinearMapping2D map = new LinearMapping2D(A.getData());
040                double errSum = 0;
041                for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
042                        Pnt2d p = P[i];
043                        Pnt2d q = Q[i];
044                        Pnt2d pp = map.applyTo(p);
045                        double e = q.distance(pp);
046                        errSum = errSum + e * e;
047                }
048                return Math.sqrt(errSum);
049        }
050        
051}
